title: 41 Acre Masaya
description:
CONTENT
Development opportunity just outside of the city.  As Managua grows and expands, there are more homes and developments needed to facilitate the expansion.  Carretera Masaya is the main highway connecting Managua to the tourist towns and villages on the Pacific coast.  Following the highway South through the most affluent neighborhoods in Managua, you will reach this vast land that boasts 41 acres on 4 plots.  All 4 plots have clear titles and are ready to be developed.  

This property is the nearest available/clear land to the heart of Managua.  From a developer's eye, this is a gem opportunity.  Priced to sell and in the best location for those looking to settle just outside of the city, this area checks all of the boxes.  Do not miss the opportunity to invest in a growing economy, expanding city, and beautiful country.  

 

  Location: Nicaragua, Managua, Carretera Masaya

title: Vista Popoyo
description:
CONTENT
Featuring a sweeping view of Popoyo, Vista Popoyo is the perfect home for those who want to be close to the beach.
This two-bedroom three-bathroom home is fully equipped with electricity, water, modern appliances and a minimalist interior design.

  Location: Nicaragua, Rivas, Popoyo

title: Buena Onda Land
description:
CONTENT
This lot is ideal for investors looking to live by the beach.
Just a few minutes away from the sand, this affordable lot is equipped with water and electricity.

  Location: Nicaragua, Rivas, Playa Santana

title: Collaborative Calala
description:
CONTENT
Beautiful property located in one of the best areas for surfing in Nicaragua with famous breaks like Playa Santana, Magnific Rock, and Popoyo Near Playa Jiquilite, off the main road of the up and coming Los Mangos sub-community of Popoyo.

Just 400 meters from the beach. A very large and well-maintained property with many mature plants and manicured landscapes. Ideal for someone looking for land with an awesome opportunity to purchase and create a dream, or divide the property in separate lots to sell.

Many business opportunities including the idea of building houses to rent out or sell individually as turn-key homes. This property could also make an ideally situated hotel with accommodations for travelers. The property is lush, fenced in and has nearly 80 trees and 500 plants with private water well on premises.

Many restaurants and bars close by including Buena Onda, Café con Leche, Malibu Popoyo, Popoyo Republic, Magnific Rock and more.

ADDITIONAL

-Storage warehouse 20 Mt²
-Big freshwater well that supplies the whole property
-Office 10 Mt²
-Two level building of 70 Mt²
-25 Mt² of shady floored area
-Ocean views
-Mango, guayaba, and several more fruit trees.

  Location: Nicaragua, Rivas, Playa Jiquelite

title: Iguana Lot L-17
description:
CONTENT
Centrally located lot in Hacienda Iguana,  beautiful Golf course views of the 2nd hole fairway, a short walk from many restaurants, bars  and shops and just minutes from the many Surf breaks including Playa Colorados.

  Location: Nicaragua, Rivas, Iguana

title: Beach front House
description:
CONTENT
This is a charming 2 bedroom beach house right on the sands of Playa Santana. It has 31 meters of beach frontage.

It is a great location on the beach between Mag Rock and Buena Onda. It is within walking distance to many of the Popeye area’s best surf breaks including the Outer Reef. A ten minute walk along the beach to the south is the consistent beach break at Playa Santana.

The property is 2 adjacent lots. On one side of the property you have the 2 bedroom beach cottage, the driveway with ample parking space, underground  water storage tank and the septic system.

The other side has plenty of shade trees and room to expand.  With this property you can add to the existing home, build a large second home, a small hotel, or numerous casitas. Meanwhile you have a nice place on the property to live while the expansion is going on.

The home was built in 1975 before the setbacks were established. The foundation is much closer to the beach than is currently permitted. The house is made of very solid cut stone.

  Location: Nicaragua, Rivas, Playa Santana

title: Villas de San Juan
description:
CONTENT
EXCELLENT PRICE FOR THIS NEW HOME!

This new three-bedroom home is perfect for hanging out in San Juan del Sur.  Conveniently located on the outside of town just a few minutes to Remanso Beach down the road.  Also a quick hike to Peña Rota beach.  The home has a clean, modern design and spacious interior.  Roof patio for cocktails plus a fun private pool area. Fully furnished and turnkey this home is a great investment whether for vacation rentals or your own retirement.

Easy access with mostly paved roads and very low monthly homeowner dues.

  Location: Nicaragua, Rivas, San Juan del Sur

title: Gigante Acre Lot
description:
CONTENT
Beautiful lot just on the edge of town.

This lot is ready to be built on with a 260’ well already dug.  Just a few minutes walk to the local surf break and a 3 minute drive to restaurants, and shops in town.  This lot is located in a quiet neighbourhood at the base of a small mountain.  The possibilities on this property are endless.  From a private home to an airbnb or multiple buildings to operate a retreat center.

The lot has been recently cleared and shows very well.  Come see the ocean views that this property has to offer and feel the potential.

 

  Location: Nicaragua, Rivas, Playa Gigante

title: Home Playa Gigante
description:
CONTENT
Beautiful 3 bedroom home in town. 

Property is currently operating as an airbnb with so much potential.  Recently renovated with furniture and new appliances.  All 3 bedrooms have separate air conditioning units.  The house boasts a huge kitchen and dining room, comfortable shaded lounge area, huge grassy yard, and a covered parking area.  Attached to the home is a private studio apartment with bedroom, kitchen, bathroom, and separate entrance. 

This house is a 3 minute walk to the local surf break and undeveloped beach of Playa Amarillo, and a 5 minute walk to town where you will find all the shops and restaurants.

  Location: Nicaragua, Rivas, Playa Gigante

title: Lot Ocean View
description:
CONTENT
Beautiful corner lot just outside of town.

The lot has beautiful ocean views in one direction and equally impressive valley views in the opposite direction.  Located in a quiet neighbourhood close to everything.  Electricity lines are directly adjacent to the property which is going to be handy when developing.  A nearby well designed to provide water to the whole neighborhood means another utility is easily connected.

This land has mature trees which offer great shade, and a well taken care of street for access.

  Location: Nicaragua, Rivas, Playa Gigante

title: Gigante Bay
description:
CONTENT
Hands down the dreamiest spot in town!

Encompassing the southern end of Gigante Bay, this location is the only one like it of its kind. Breathtaking views all around! A front row seat for the epic Nicaraguan sunsets, boats on the bay and the hills and mountains that surround.

41 meters of pristine beach frontage.

  Location: Nicaragua, Rivas, Playa Gigante

title: Casa Riviera
description:
CONTENT
Located in the beautiful, gated community of Hacienda Iguana and just a short distance from the world class beach break called Playa Colorados.

This newly remodeled home is set on a 1/2 acre lot that backs onto Rio Murcielago creek. This turnkey home offers both privacy and space with a fresh aesthetic that makes you feel right at home.

Enjoy all of the amenities of this private beach community including an impeccable 9 hole golf course, complete surf shop, spa, 2 mini markets, 4 restaurants, and coffee shop. The new Emerald Coast Airport (ECI) is located only 10 minutes away with flights arriving from Managua and Liberia.
Location: Nicaragua, Rivas, Iguana
